tasks.tar-all: deno task tar-mac-arm64 && deno task tar-mac-amd64 && deno task tar-win-amd64 && deno task tar-linux-amd64 && deno task tar-linux-arm64
tasks.compile-win-amd64: deno compile --allow-all --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc --v8-flags=--max-old-space-size=8000 --include src/actions/overwrite.worker.ts --output dist/win-amd64/in/cndi.exe main.ts
tasks.compile-linux-arm64: deno compile --allow-all --target aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu --v8-flags=--max-old-space-size=8000 --include src/actions/overwrite.worker.ts --output dist/linux-arm64/in/cndi main.ts
tasks.compile-linux-amd64: deno compile --allow-all --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --v8-flags=--max-old-space-size=8000 --include src/actions/overwrite.worker.ts --output dist/linux-amd64/in/cndi main.ts
tasks.compile-mac-arm64: deno compile --allow-all --target aarch64-apple-darwin --v8-flags=--max-old-space-size=8000 --include src/actions/overwrite.worker.ts --output dist/mac-arm64/in/cndi main.ts
tasks.compile-mac-amd64: deno compile --allow-all --target x86_64-apple-darwin --v8-flags=--max-old-space-size=8000 --include src/actions/overwrite.worker.ts --output dist/mac-amd64/in/cndi main.ts
tasks.compile-all: deno task compile-win-amd64 && deno task compile-linux-amd64 && deno task compile-linux-arm64 && deno task compile-mac-arm64 && deno task compile-mac-amd64
tasks.clean-dist: deno task clean-mac-arm64 && deno task clean-mac-amd64 && deno task clean-win-amd64 && deno task clean-linux-amd64 && deno task clean-linux-arm64
tasks.build: deno lint && deno task check && deno fmt && deno task clean-dist && deno task compile-all && deno task tar-all
tasks.build-mac-arm64: deno lint && deno task check && deno fmt && deno task clean-dist && deno task compile-mac-arm64
tasks.build-mac-amd64: deno lint && deno task check && deno fmt && deno task clean-dist && deno task compile-mac-amd64
tasks.build-linux-amd64: deno lint && deno task check && deno fmt && deno task clean-dist && deno task compile-linux-amd64
tasks.build-linux-arm64: deno lint && deno task check && deno fmt && deno task clean-dist && deno task compile-linux-arm64
